mapper.select: SELECT info_board_no, info_board_title, info_board_start, info_board_like, info_board_count, CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NAME FROM ( SELECT info_board_no, info_board_title, info_board_start, info_board_like, info_board_count, CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NAME , row_number() over(order by info_board_no desc) as rnum FROM info_board info, cat_small_group cat where INFO.CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NO = CAT.CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NO) ib WHERE rnum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} ORDER BY info_board_start desc

SELECT INFO_BOARD_NO, INFO_BOARD_TITLE, INFO_BOARD_START, CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NAME, INFO_BOARD_COUNT, INFO_BOARD_LIKE, INFO_BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_BOARD_URL from info_board info, cat_small_group cat where INFO.CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NO = CAT.CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NO ORDER BY info_board_start desc
SELECT COUNT(info_board_no) FROM info_board WHERE info_board_no > 0

SELECT INFO_BOARD_NO, INFO_BOARD_TITLE, INFO_BOARD_START, CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NAME, INFO_BOARD_COUNT, INFO_BOARD_LIKE, INFO_BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_BOARD_URL from info_board info, cat_small_group cat where INFO.CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NO = CAT.CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NO and info_board_no = #{info_board_no}

SELECT INFO_BOARD_NO, INFO_BOARD_TITLE, INFO_BOARD_START, CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NAME, INFO_BOARD_COUNT, INFO_BOARD_LIKE, INFO_BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_BOARD_URL from info_board info, cat_small_group cat where INFO.CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NO = CAT.CAT_SMALL_GROUP_NO and info_board_content like '%'||#{vo}||'%' ORDER BY info_board_start desc
mapper.update: UPDATE info_board SET info_board_count = info_board_count+1 WHERE info_board_no = #{user_board_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM like_info_list WHERE info_board_no = #{info_board_no} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT like_info_list_no, info_board_title, user_id, info_board_start, info_board_count, info_board_like FROM ( SELECT a.like_info_list_no, b.info_board_title, b.user_id, b.info_board_start, b.info_board_count, b.info_board_like, row_number() over(order by 1 desc) as rnum FROM like_info_list a, info_board b WHERE a.info_board_no = b.info_board_no(+) and a.user_id = #{user_id }) WHERE rnum between 1 and 10 ORDER BY like_info_list_no desc
